conclusion: Consider forces on block P and board ab to find frictional force by ground.
Block P has mass m and gravitational force mg.
Normal force N_P on block P is mg.
Kinetic frictional force on block P is f_{Pab} = μ2 mg.
Board ab has mass M and gravitational force Mg.
Normal force N_{ab} on board ab is (M + m)g.
Kinetic frictional force by board ab on block P is μ2 mg.
Net force on board ab involves balancing frictional forces.
By Newton's Third Law, frictional force by board on block equals frictional force by block on board.
Frictional force by ground on board ab is μ2 mg.
